description: This file declares the DobbySpecGenerator class, which is responsible for generating JSON specifications for runtime configurations. It includes methods for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and resource limits, and interacts with ApplicationConfiguration and RuntimeConfig objects.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating runtime specifications in JSON format based on application and environment configurations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates the JSON specification string based on provided configurations.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variables for the runtime specification.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mount points for the runtime specification.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK-specific plugins for the runtime.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates a minidump plugin configuration.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates an SDK plugin for application services.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount configuration for the filesystem.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines if GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Returns the string representing CPU core configuration.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Adds classic plugins to the runtime spec.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethan log plugin configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates multicast socket plugin configuration.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ion memory plugin configuration.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount points.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKPS mounts.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a tmpfs mount with specified options.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Gets the working directory for the runtime.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON configuration.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes a URL string.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds hole punch port configuration to JSON spec.
